sentences.english: Drill cross section profile(DCSP) is a characteristic parameter of drill helix flute form.
sentences.chinese: 横向截形是麻花钻螺旋面容屑槽的一个特征参数。

sentences.english: Longitudinal and transverse modulators, photorefractive effect, real-time holography.
sentences.chinese: 纵向与横向调变器，光折射效应，即时全像术。

sentences.english: We must join up with parallel enterprises to develop the tourism industry.
sentences.chinese: 横向联合起来，发展旅游事业。

sentences.english: Furtherly, it presents the strategy about lateral transshipment.
sentences.chinese: 并进一步对横向转载策略进行详细说明。

sentences.english: Bending test specified values apply to horizontal samples.
sentences.chinese: 弯曲试验规定值适用于横向试样。

sentences.english: Two-fluid model was employed to simulate two-phase phenomena of supersonic crossflow .
sentences.chinese: 对两相超声速横向喷射试验进行了数值模拟。

sentences.english: A simple method for the estimation of the transverse shielding for intense- beam proton linac was described briefly.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了估算强流质子直线加速器横向屏蔽的方法。

sentences.english: Horizontal gene transfer (HGT) is a cross-species form of genetic transfer.
sentences.chinese: 横向基因迁移是指跨物种形式的遗传迁移。

sentences.english: Sound can be tuned by changing the material of the horizontal supporting pieces or porous vertical pieces.
sentences.chinese: 声音可以借由改变横向配套件或多孔材料垂直件。

sentences.english: Justified text is spaced out so that each line is of the same length.
sentences.chinese: 等距调整让每一行的横向长度一致。

sentences.english: It targets you inner most abdominal muscle , the transverse abdominis.
sentences.chinese: 它的目标你内心最腹部肌肉拉伤，横向腹直肌。

sentences.english: The latter will certainly become the main trend in the present world, and will be the main tendency…
sentences.chinese: 服装横向发展必然成为现今世界范围的主流。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter is mainly about the various dialects comparative study from horizontal point.
sentences.chinese: 第六章对各个方言点的横向比较研究。

sentences.english: Turbulent coherent structures in the outer region of TBL are mainly lateral vortices.
sentences.chinese: 湍流边界层外区的相干结构主要表现为大尺度横向涡。

sentences.english: Transverse dunes run are a right angle to the constant wind direction.
sentences.chinese: 横向沙丘与风的方向始终处于直角。
同样也是横向相互联系的。
